author: hsiaowei
content:
CL specs should add
- https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3391 (`data_gas_used`)
- https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3392 (`uint64` gas counter)

iiuc CL spec is waiting for EIP, EIP is waiting for the call on Thursday to finalize the `uint256`  -> `uint64` change.

author: barnabasbusa
content: Added.

author: roberto.bayardo
content: Only the spec we are targeting is written down. Other than that it's sort of by ear... mostly trying to just get all possible pairs of CL/EL clients successfully syncing and updating the chain and passing all the test suites & whatever fuzz tests get thrown at it.  For devnet-6 we hope it to be the last eip-4844 specific devnet and evolve it into a full deneb devnet.
